short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows bacon where logos once were. Not on every website, no. Subtle. Knifey-spoony.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove unsightly logos from your daily websites and replace with BACON!

This Chrome extension scratches my itch, and I'm sure it'll do the same for you.
